caption.p: a) SAM bound ZIKV NS5 MTase in PDB 5M5B. 23 b) Docking of compound 6 in ZIKV NS5 MTase. The carbazole pocket is accommodated in the hydrophobic environment that binds the adenine portion of SAM. The p‐nitro group interacts with Ser62, mimicking the carboxy moiety of SAM. The carbamide spacer allows the two domains to be spaced appropriately for favorably interacting with the key residues of the binding pocket. c) Docking of compound 6 in DENV NS5‐MTase (PDB 5E9Q). 24
